Plate VII
Structure of Disks of Complex Types,
        in Vertical Section.

1. Inner surface of a zone of a thick fossil disk,
showing tolerably-regular arrangement of the col-
umnar cells, <s>and</s> the segmental constrictions of these,
and the fissures leading into those of the next row:-
100 diam.
9. Outer surface of a similar zone, showing the continui-
ty of the <s>supe</s> cells of the superficial layer with the ver-
tical columns of the intermediate (the  latter not un-
frequently dividing, however, at their extremities, so
as to form two cells at the end of each column), and the
pores leading to the <s>altern</s> oblique passages, directed
alternately to one side and to the other, which lead to the
cavities of the columnar cells:- <s>50</s> 100 diam.
<s>2. Vertical section taken in the radial direction <s>of the thicker</s>  (continuation of Fig.4)
of the thicker outer portion of an incompletely developed</s>
